channel.title: My players get this
channel.description: well when ever my players are playing every so often there screen freezes and the .bat shows [code]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 9589 at client.f(client.java) at client.a(client.java) at client.bb(client.java) at client.G(client.java) at client.c(client.java) at a.run(a.java) at client.run(client.java) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]does anyone know the problem? if so could you help me fix it

item.title: My players get this
item.dc:creator: @chesslemac chesslemac
item.description:
@chesslemac wrote:

well when ever my players are playing every so often there screen freezes and the .bat shows

Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 9589 at client.f(client.java) at client.a(client.java) at client.bb(client.java) at client.G(client.java) at client.c(client.java) at a.run(a.java) at client.run(client.java) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) does anyone know the problem? if so could you help me fix it

Read full topic
